scripts.deploy: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && next build && next export && touch out/.nojekyll && cd out && git init && git remote add origin https://github.com/codeKiuk/codeKiuk.github.io.git && git add -f . && git commit -m "Deploy Blog #build" && git push -f origin main
scripts.dev-deploy: next build && next export && next start
